events.description: Upcoming release of inflation data for the Eurozone bloc.
Upcoming private sector employment data from the United States.
Interest rate decision by the European Central Bank.
Interest rate decision by the Bank of England.
Negotiations between Russian and Ukrainian representatives aiming for a conflict resolution.
US military action against an Iranian surveillance drone near the southern coast.

facts.fact_text: The STOXX 50 index rose 0.5% while the STOXX 600 fell 0.2%.

evidences.evidence_text: European equities were mixed on Wednesday, with the STOXX 50 up 0.5% while the broader STOXX 600 slipped 0.2%

facts.fact_text: Credit Agricole shares fell more than 2% after missing Q4 profit forecasts.

evidences.evidence_text: Credit Agricole fell more than 2% after posting Q4 profit that missed analysts’ forecasts.

facts.fact_text: The US military shot down an Iranian surveillance drone.

evidences.evidence_text: the US military reportedly shot down an Iranian surveillance drone near the country’s southern coast.

claims.claim_text: Eurozone inflation is expected to have eased to 1.7% last month.
claims.author: Markets

evidences.evidence_text: Markets expect inflation in the bloc to have eased to 1.7% last month

claims.claim_text: Interest rates for the ECB and BoE are expected to remain unchanged.
claims.author: Investors

evidences.evidence_text: tomorrow’s ECB and BoE policy decisions, where rates are expected to remain on hold.

claims.claim_text: A sharper downside surprise in inflation could worry policymakers due to the euro's appreciation.

evidences.evidence_text: a sharper downside surprise could fuel concerns among policymakers already wary of the euro’s rapid appreciation.

evidence.evidence_text: investors awaited major releases including the Eurozone flash CPI... Markets expect inflation in the bloc to have eased to 1.7%
tomorrow’s ECB and BoE policy decisions, where rates are expected to remain on hold.
investors awaited major releases including the... US ADP jobs report.
talks between Russian and Ukrainian negotiators in Abu Dhabi aim to advance a potential resolution to the conflict
a sharper downside surprise could fuel concerns among policymakers already wary of the euro’s rapid appreciation.
